Indicate by check mark whether the registrant is an emerging growth company as defined in Rule 405 of the Securities Act of 1933 (&#167;230.405 of this chapter) or Rule 12b-2 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (&#167;240.12b-2 of this chapter). Emerging growth company&#8194; &#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section&#160;13(a) of the Exchange Act.&#8194;&#9744; &#160; &#160; &#160; Item&#8201;8.01 Other Events. On January 27, 2025, JPMorgan Chase &amp; Co. issued a press release announcing the redemption on February 1, 2025 of all of the 3,000,000 outstanding depositary shares, each representing a one-tenth interest in a share of JPMorgan Chase &amp; Co.&#8217;s Fixed-to-Floating Rate Non-Cumulative Preferred Stock, Series HH, par value $1.00 per share and with a liquidation preference of $10,000 (the &#8220;Series HH Preferred Stock&#8221;), pursuant to the optional redemption provisions in the documents governing such depositary shares and the Series HH Preferred Stock. A copy of the press release referenced above is attached hereto as Exhibit 99.1. &#160; Item&#8201;9.01. Financial Statements and Exhibits. (d) Exhibits &#160; 99.1 &#160;&#160; JPMorgan Chase &amp; Co. press release dated January 27, 2025. 101 &#160;&#160; Pursuant to Rule 406 of Regulation S-T, the cover page is formatted in Inline XBRL (Inline eXtensible Business Reporting Language). 104 &#160;&#160; Cover Page Interactive Data File (embedded within the Inline XBRL document and included in Exhibit&#160;101).
